attributes.review: It’s really slow and crashes way too much. I know most of the bad reviews are from those kids but has anyone looked at the privacy policy. No one reads that stuff but if you did it would surprise you. Overall the app itself doesn’t work right.
attributes.title: The worst app to ever exist

attributes.review: First of all it took so long to download when all my other apps are quick then once I got in it made my phone glitch and freeze it has never done that before lastly it started turning my phone screen into a orange tint if I could rate it less I would
attributes.title: Terrible app

attributes.review: First, this app took hours to download and I already have space on my phone. Second, once it did download, the app was slow and couldn’t do anything. Then when I exited the app, I had found out a virus was downloaded to my phone due to the app. Terrible. Wouldn’t wish this on anyone.
attributes.title: Scam

attributes.review:
I hateeeee this app I do not recommend at all they make you pay for just fake and dumb disgusting news about a dump piece of $h|t.it takes too much time to download the news are slow they show no love to the blm movement they are racist and the whole app is 🗑 
Also if they end up taking TikTok down I’ll sue this whole app
attributes.title: Bruh-🤡🤡🤡🤡

attributes.review: This app is sooo bad it took weeks almost months to download and they don’t know how to spell Sertain words on here and the service on this app omg HORRIBLE don’t download it! I also don’t have time to look at what he posts bc ykk I had to go walk my pet fish🐠 and when pictures show up as him it’s looks like oranges🍊🍊yeah it’s soo bad👁👄👁
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: I keep seeing reviews left kids but y’all already know i’m a real one🐲 this app took 5 months to download and it ate my phone screen🤦‍♀️ i it won’t even stay open for more than 5 seconds at a time👁👄👁 it also made me lose all motor function in my legs🦵hope y’all don’t fall for this like i did😤
attributes.title: SERIOUS REVIEW!!

attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible it took a month to download and when I open the app it was completely glitched and took so long to load. Trump is trash Trump is trash Trump is trash Travis trash when I downloaded the app cockroaches came from the ceiling and it added a bug to my phone it took so much and so much money
attributes.title: TRASH

attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE, when I downloaded it my phone started to glitch terribly. It was so bad that it started to make screeching noises!🤨My cat started throwing up all over my chest. Also my phone got very hot to the point where I had to put it in the freezer. I’m stating TRUE FACTS. Please do not download this app.
attributes.title: Horrible, will never use again😤

attributes.review: It was trouble right from the start, same could be said about the trump administration. It made my other apps crash and it was downloading unknown software on my phone. Considering this app was created for the president it should have worked better, it’s a shame really.
attributes.title: This app is horrible

attributes.review: This app is really bad because it is trying to take down tik tok and you don’t understand how many people have grown and popularized through this platform. And your trying to take this away. People love entertainment on tik tok and your trying to take it away.
attributes.title: This app is horrible just like its inspiration.
